meanings.sent1: The mannequin had a sexless appearance, with no defining features.
meanings.sent2: The doll's face was intentionally made sexless to appeal to a wider audience.
meanings.sent3: It was a bit comical how the cartoon character ended up looking completely sexless.
meanings.sent4: The landscape was so barren and sexless, it felt like a forgotten dream.
meanings.sent5: The room was eerily sexless, devoid of any personal touches.

meanings.definition: Not involving or related to sexual activity.
meanings.sent1: The sexless conversation focused solely on work and hobbies.
meanings.sent2: The movie was a refreshing change with its sexless storyline.
meanings.sent3: It was amusing how the party turned into a completely sexless affair.
meanings.sent4: The atmosphere in the library was so sexless, it felt like a different world.
meanings.sent5: The painting depicted a serene and sexless moment in time.

meanings.sent1: After the breakup, she felt completely sexless and uninterested.
meanings.sent2: The medication had a side effect of making him feel sexless.
meanings.sent3: It was funny how the comedy show portrayed the character as sexless.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was consumed by work, leaving her feeling sexless and detached.
meanings.sent5: The character in the book was written as a sexless being, focused only on knowledge.
